FlowGraph

Struct CanvasVector

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Coordinates
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

A vector/delta in canvas coordinate space.

Canvas vectors represent movements, offsets, and distances in canvas space. Unlike canvas points, vectors are relative (they represent the difference between two points, not an absolute position).

When to use:

  • Drag distances in canvas space
  • Node movement offsets
  • Snap offsets
  • Collision avoidance adjustments
public readonly record struct CanvasVector : IEquatable<CanvasVector>

A vector/delta in canvas coordinate space.

Canvas vectors represent movements, offsets, and distances in canvas space. Unlike canvas points, vectors are relative (they represent the difference between two points, not an absolute position).

When to use:

  • Drag distances in canvas space
  • Node movement offsets
  • Snap offsets
  • Collision avoidance adjustments
